ecosystem.title: Our ecosystem
ecosystem.boavizta: We are members of Boavizta, a collaborative workgroup aiming at providing open source methodologies and tools to measure the environmental footprint of digital technology.
ecosystem.agit: We are also members of Alliance Green IT, a non-profit organization whose goal is to disseminate environmental and social best practices in the digital world.
ecosystem.shift-your-job: Shift Your Job is a platform listing organizations which contribute to the transition to a low-carbon world.
ecosystem.bpi-france: As part of the Innov'Up 'Faisabilit√©' financing scheme, we received financial support from BPIFrance to develop our project.

philosophy.title: Our philosophy
paragraphs: We are convinced that the ecological and social emergency requires us to act quickly and concretely to <strong>transform business models<strong>: tomorrow's organisation will either exist within planetary limits or it will not.

To support our partners through the necessary transformations, we deploy complementary approaches: strategic, to understand and steer the issues; technical, to implement and equip; educational, to pass on and empower.

The philosophy that drives us is that of the commons, digital or not, because cooperation and mutual aid are at the heart of the challenges of resilience and sustainability. It's also one of sobriety, because transition cannot happen without questioning our needs, our uses and our ways of doing things. Finally, it is about joy, because we are convinced that a sustainable world is a happy world, rich in links, experiences and meaning.

bios.bio: D√©veloppeur logiciel depuis plus de 12 ans, mon constat est simple : le logiciel est omnipr√©sent dans nos vies et nous ne pouvons pas ignorer ses effets sur les individus, les groupes et l'√©cosyst√®me fini qu'est notre plan√®te. Je reste fascin√© par l'incroyable impact que peuvent avoir quelques lignes de code informatique.
